original_text: And the wings of the cherubims were twenty cubits long: one wing of the one cherub was five cubits, reaching to the wall of the house: and the other wing was likewise five cubits, reaching to the wing of the other cherub.
korean_text: 두 그룹의 날개 길이가 모두 이십 규빗이라 왼쪽 그룹의 한 날개는 다섯 규빗이니 성전 벽에 닿았고 그 다른 날개도 다섯 규빗이니 오른쪽 그룹의 날개에 닿았으며

sentences.original_text: And the wings of the cherubims were twenty cubits long
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그룹의 날개들은 스무 규빗 길이였습니다

sentences.original_text: one wing of the one cherub was five cubits
sentences.korean_translation: 한 그룹의 한 날개는 다섯 규빗이었습니다

sentences.original_text: reaching to the wall of the house
and the other wing was likewise five cubits
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다른 날개도 마찬가지로 다섯 규빗이었습니다

sentences.original_text: reaching to the wing of the other cherub
